publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2791 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Travis Success At Brit Awardsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Travis for its success at the recent Brit Awards in winning the Best British Band category; notes the tremendous achievements of Travis and other Scottish bands in the music industry, and looks forward to more success from Scottish bands in the future.
S1M-2791 Travis Success At Brit Awards (lodged on 26 February 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-2791 Travis Success At Brit Awards (lodged on 26 February 2002) Michael Matheson*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-2791 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Travis Success At Brit Awards-That the Parliament congratulates Travis for its success at the recent Brit Awards in winning the Best British Band category; notes the tremendous achievements of Travis and other Scottish bands in the music industry, and looks forward to more success from Scottish bands in the future. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson, Mr Brian Monteith, Michael Russell*
S1M-2791 Travis Success At Brit Awards (lodged on 26 February 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2791 Travis Success At Brit Awards (lodged on 26 February 2002) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2791 Travis Success At Brit Awards (lodged on 26 February 2002) Irene McGugan*
